definition_en: The specific thermal and chemical conditions (pressure, temperature, water chemistry) of the coolant in a light water reactor that can influence material degradation.
definition_ko: 재료의 열화를 유발할 수 있는 경수로 내 냉각재의 특정 열적, 화학적 상태(압력, 온도, 수화학 등).

slots.context_ko: Effects of LWR Coolant Environments on Fatigue Design Curves of Austenitic Stainless Steels
